data.name: Hook 2 Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Czech*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Spanish - Latin America*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Romanian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Hungarian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
